# File lib/dataset/database/base.rb, line 10
10:       def clear
11:         connection = ActiveRecord::Base.connection
12:         ActiveRecord::Base.silence do
13:           connection.tables.each do |table_name|
14:             connection.delete "DELETE FROM #{connection.quote_table_name(table_name)}",
15:               "Dataset::Database#clear"
16:           end
17:         end
18:       end
